description.name: arberc20
description.tagline: Arbitrum erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-arb Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Arbitrum erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/arb receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/arb wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
